scripts.copy-mapbox-data: rm -rf apps/candle/priv/static/mapbox; mkdir -p apps/candle/priv/static/mapbox; cp -r node_modules/mapbox.js/theme/* apps/candle/priv/static/mapbox
scripts.copy-fonts-data: rm -rf apps/candle/priv/static/fonts; mkdir -p apps/candle/priv/static/fonts; cp apps/candle/custom_deps/fonts/daniel/daniel.ttf apps/candle/priv/static/fonts; cp apps/candle/custom_deps/fonts/christopherhand.ttf apps/candle/priv/static/fonts; cp -r apps/candle/custom_deps/fonts/archer-book apps/candle/priv/static/fonts;
scripts.build-assets: cp -r apps/candle/web/static/assets/* apps/candle/priv/static; npm run copy-mapbox-data; npm run copy-fonts-data;
scripts.build-js: rm -rf apps/candle/priv/static/js; mkdir -p apps/candle/priv/static/js; browserify -t babelify apps/candle/web/static/js/main.js > apps/candle/priv/static/js/main.js
scripts.watch-js: rm -rf apps/candle/priv/static/js; mkdir -p apps/candle/priv/static/js; watchify -t babelify apps/candle/web/static/js/main.js -o apps/candle/priv/static/js/main.js -dv
scripts.build-css: rm -rf apps/candle/priv/static/css; mkdir -p apps/candle/priv/static/css; sass apps/candle/web/static/css/base.scss priv/static/css/base.css
scripts.build: npm run build-js & npm run build-css & npm run build-assets
scripts.watch: npm run watch-js & npm run watch-css & npm run watch-bootstrap & npm run watch-assets
